query:
ALTER TABLE users
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS phone VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS profileImage TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS educationLevel ENUM('elementary', 'middle', 'high') DEFAULT 'elementary',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subjects TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS licenseIssueDate DATE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS licenseExpiryDate DATE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS teacherLevel ENUM('practitioner', 'advanced', 'expert') DEFAULT 'practitioner',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS preferredTheme VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'modern',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS preferredCoverTheme VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'classic'
command:

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS phone VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS profileImage TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS educationLevel ENUM('elementary', 'middle', 'high') DEFAULT 'elementary',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subjects TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS licenseIssueDate DATE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS licenseExpiryDate DATE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS teacherLevel ENUM('practitioner', 'advanced', 'expert') DEFAULT 'practitioner',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS preferredTheme VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'modern',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS preferredCoverTheme VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'classic'
